ABOUT ARCHIVES COWBOYS CONTRIBUTE

Contribute Money

Putting up $1,000 bounties gets expensive! That's why Cowboy Collective has a Patreon! Help us make more cowboy art and fund new and interesting projects by pitching in a little money. All Patreon members who pay $5 or more monthly automatically qualify to be a Card Carrying Cowboy Collective Cowboy!

GO TO PATREON



If donating on the regular isn't your style, then Cowboy Collective gladly accepts one-time donations! We can't add you to the list of Card Carrying Cowboys, but we'd still be mighty grateful.

MAKE ONE-TIME DONATION



Contribute Writings / Art

The Cowboy Collective wants to invite anyone and everyone to contribute, we are about freedom of expression! Poetry, recipes, photos, funny projects or ideas, nothing is too strange or too normal for the Cowboy Collective archives.

Do note that we want everyone to feel included. You might want to read over the Rules of the Cowboy to make sure that what you're sharing is in the cowboy spirit. Everything in the Cowboy Collective archives is Creative Commons, so if you share it here, you have to be okay with other cowboys making it their own. When you submit work you automatically qualify to be a Card Carrying Cowboy Collective Cowboy!

Shoot us an email at contribute@cowboycollective.cc, or fill out the form below.


















Ongoing Cowboy Collective Projects

If you're looking to contribute but not sure where to start, check out one of our ongoing projects! These are established projects that anyone can contribute to.
